domain
Class Media

java.lang.Object
  domain.Media

public class Media
extends java.lang.Object

This class acts as the media manager for all the Sprite instances of the game. It's the responsible of carrying the image and sound petitions from a Sprite.

Method Summary

getImage

protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(java.lang.String name)
This method gets a simple BufferedImage from the ImagesManager instance.

Parameters:
name - the name of the stored image requested
Returns:
The BufferedImage instance associated to the name. null if the imagesManger is null or if the ImagesManager haven't found the specified image.
See Also:
ImagesManager.getImage(java.lang.String)

getImages

protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getImages(java.lang.String name)
This method gets an ArrayList of BufferedImage from the ImagesManager instance.

Parameters:
name - the name of the stored images requested
Returns:
The ArrayList of BufferedImage instance associated to the name. null if the imagesManger is null or if the ImagesManager haven't found the specified ArrayList.
See Also:
ImagesManager.getImages(java.lang.String)

getAnimator

protected ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator getAnimator(Sprite sprite,
                                                   java.lang.String imagesName,
                                                   int animationPeriod,
                                                   double sequenceDuration,
                                                   boolean isRepeating)
This method is used to get an ImageAnimator with a sequence of images

Parameters:
sprite - The Sprite asking for the ImagesAnimator instance
imagesName - The name specifying the desired set of images
animationPeriod - The period that indicates how often the ImagesAnimator setImage() method will be invoked.
sequenceDuration - The total amount of time that a sequence should take
isRepeating - A boolean value indicating if the ImagesAnimator should restart the sequence when it reaches or passes the end of it.
Returns:
an ImagesAnimator instance with a sequence of images loaded. Or null if the images were not found or the imagesManager is null.
See Also:
ImagesManager.getAnimator(domain.Sprite, java.lang.String, int, double, boolean)

getAudioClipPlayer

protected SoundsManager.AudioClipPlayer getAudioClipPlayer(java.lang.String soundName)
This method is used to get an AudioClipPlayer instance

Parameters:
soundName - The name associated to the AudioClip instance that is wanted to be managed by the AudioClipPlayer instance.
Returns:
an AudioClipPlayer with an AudioClip instance loaded. null if the sound is not found or if the soundManager is null.
See Also:
SoundsManager.getAudioClipPlayer(java.lang.String)

getClipPlayer

protected SoundsManager.ClipPlayer getClipPlayer(java.lang.String soundName)
This method is used to get an ClipPlayer instance

Parameters:
soundName - The name associated to the Clip instance that is wanted to be managed by the ClipPlayer instance.
Returns:
an ClipPlayer with a Clip instance loaded. null if the sound is not found or if the soundManager is null.
See Also:
